definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Hezbollah fought a 34-day war with Israel in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 真主党在2006年的时候跟以色列交火34天。

sentences.english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 真主使谁迷误，在真主的弃绝后，谁没有任何保护者。

sentences.english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 真主使谁迷误，在真主的弃绝后，谁没有任何保护者。

sentences.english: Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
sentences.chinese: 即真主的众仆所饮的一道泉水，他们将使它大量涌出。

sentences.english: God willing, it will ward off the dreams and he won't have them again.
sentences.chinese: 若真主愿意，它将挡开这些梦，他不再会做这样的梦。

sentences.english: Men who follow Islam and fight for their faith atop heavily armored horses.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林重骑兵为信仰而战，为真主而战。

sentences.english: To Allah belongeth the Mystery of the heavens and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 天地的幽玄只是真主的。

sentences.english: Heavy Swordsmen who follow Islam and fight for their faith.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林重装剑士为信仰而战，为真主而战。

sentences.english: Everything is in the form of atoms, and every particle contains the qudrat, the power of Allah.
sentences.chinese: 在一粒原子中包含了万物，这是真主的能力。

sentences.english: But Allah is ever round the rejecters of Faith!
sentences.chinese: 真主是周知不信道的人们的。

sentences.english: SHAKIR:And that Allah might help you with a mighty help.
sentences.chinese: 真主将给你一种有力的援助。

sentences.english: For Allah is well aware of all that ye do.
sentences.chinese: 真主是彻知你们的行为的。

sentences.english: Today, I announce the breakup of India, inshallah.
sentences.chinese: 真主保佑，今天，我宣布印度解体。

sentences.english: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder ? His Promise needs must be accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 天将为那日而破裂，真主的应许要实现的。

sentences.english: And those whom Allah leaves to stray, no one can guide.
sentences.chinese: 真主使谁迷误，谁就没有向导。

sentences.english: And why should Allah not punish them, when they have barred others from the Sacred Mosque, although they were not its guardians?
sentences.chinese: 他们阻止别人入禁寺的时候，真主怎能不惩治他们呢？

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
